availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Trayler (Caldwell Co. Farmer and physician )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and physician. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Jones Trayler in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on November 21, 1846. Father of Rufus L. C. Trayler, John Trayler, and Joseph Trayler,. Married to Rebecca Trayler. Father of Nancy Trayler. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Physician in Farmersville in 1860. Physician in Caldwell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 288A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Farmersville, p. 120.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 263.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Caldwell County, KY, June 1863, p. 22.
